title: Serpint - Controlling Raspberry Pi GPIO with a Serial Port/Socket
summary: Serpint is software for controlling the GPIO pins on a Raspberry Pi over a socket or serial port.  It can be used to control the GPIO pins from languages that don't already have a GPIO library, but do for sockets or serial, or from programs that expect a serial port, and do that from half a world away.
